comments:
To reproduce:
- Enabled RAC with security
- Launch external Java application, error shows with following stack

java.lang.NullPointerException
null

java.lang.NullPointerException
  at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.security.KeystoreManagerImpl.loadKeystore(KeystoreManagerImpl.java:50)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.secureConnect(BaseConnectUtil.java:415)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.connect(BaseConnectUtil.java:222)
  at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.connect(BaseConnectUtil.java:530)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.common.ui.trace.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect(PDCoreUtil.java:789)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.common.ui.trace.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect(PDCoreUtil.java:801)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.AbstractProcessLauncher.createNode(AbstractProcessLauncher.java:247)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.PrimaryLaunchDelegate.run(PrimaryLaunchDelegate.java:208)
  at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:566)

I get a very similar error stack (below) and null pointer error message when trying to do a remote import with security enabled on the RAC as well as when profiling an application locally with security enabled on the local AC. 
  at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.security.KeystoreManagerImpl.loadKeystore(KeystoreManagerImpl.java:50)
at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.secureConnect(BaseConnectUtil.java:415)
at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.connectConnection(BaseConnectUtil.java:275)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.RemoteImportHandler.connect(RemoteImportHandler.java:141)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.importFromRemoteHost(ImportLogWizard.java:1961)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.importLog(ImportLogWizard.java:1819)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.run(ImportLogWizard.java:327)
at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:67)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.performFinish(ImportLogWizard.java:248)
at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.finishPressed(WizardDialog.java:680)
at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.buttonPressed(WizardDialog.java:355)
at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog$3.widgetSelected(Dialog.java:660)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:90)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:928)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3348)

Both tasks complete successfully when security is disabled on the RAC. I think it is a critical issue because it prevents security enablement during several tasks.
Assigning it to Samson since it is in the Hyades.execution  & RAC
Does this happen with fresh workspace/configuration?
